snippet: MAIDMAN--Gail Ann Lowe. We have lost a very dear friend of over 40 years. Gail was very unique. She was a talented designer and decorator with great taste and originality. We will miss her beauty and mostly her extraordinary kindness. She was a great friend. Our sympathies to her husband Richard, her children Star and Evan, their spouses and her grandchildren. Joy and Walter Samuels 1/3
lead_paragraph: MAIDMAN--Gail Ann Lowe. We have lost a very dear friend of over 40 years. Gail was very unique. She was a talented designer and decorator with great taste and originality. We will miss her beauty and mostly her extraordinary kindness. She was a great friend. Our sympathies to her husband Richard, her children Star and Evan, their spouses and her grandchildren. Joy and Walter Samuels 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MAIDMAN, GAIL ANN LOWE
